text: while many families are still searching
for loved ones others are already having
to bury theirs it's too much to take in
three members of the same family were
killed in Saturday's earthquake while
the family grieved the community of El
Carmen came to say goodbye football
fanatic SLO was the fourth victim his
pallbearers wearing his football strip
in honor of their fallen friend a few
hundred meters down the road we find
Jose Lowe's house or what's left of it
neighbors have returned to sort through
their belongings trying to recover what
they can luckily we were not in the
apartment otherwise we would be dead
this used to be my bed down the road we
see several other collapse buildings
torn apart in a matter of seconds most
of those who were killed lived near
coastal towns among the dead sister
Claire to raise a Crockett a nun from
Northern Ireland she was killed with
five others when a stairwell collapsed
in the school where she was teaching
rescue workers told me the town of
Pedernales is more than 80 percent
flattened and the death toll will be far
higher than what authorities are
currently saying time is running out for
those still trapped
